co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Interface FlowSpecification.Builder.FlowletAdder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet
    Enclosing class:
    FlowSpecification.Builder

    public static interface FlowSpecification.Builder.FlowletAdder
    FlowletAdder is responsible for capturing the information of a Flowlet during the specification creation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(Flowlet flowlet)
      Add a flowlet to the flow.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(Flowlet flowlet, int instances)
      Add a flowlet to the flow with the minimum number of instances of the flowlet to start with.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(String name, Flowlet flowlet)
      Add a flowlet to flow with the specified name.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(String name, Flowlet flowlet, int instances)
      Add a flowlet to flow with the specified name with minimum number of instances to start with.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(Flowlet flowlet)
        Add a flowlet to the flow.
        Parameters:
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to flow.
        Returns:
        An instance of FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet for adding more flowlets

      • add

        FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(Flowlet flowlet,
                                        int instances)
        Add a flowlet to the flow with the minimum number of instances of the flowlet to start with.
        Parameters:
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to flow.
        instances - Number of instances for the flowlet
        Returns:
        An instance of FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet for adding more flowlets

      • add

        FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(String name,
                                        Flowlet flowlet)
        Add a flowlet to flow with the specified name. The specified name overrides the one in FlowletSpecification.getName() returned by Flowlet.configure().
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the flowlet
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to flow.
        Returns:
        An instance of FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet for adding more flowlets.

      • add

        FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet add(String name,
                                        Flowlet flowlet,
                                        int instances)
        Add a flowlet to flow with the specified name with minimum number of instances to start with. The name specified overrides the one in FlowletSpecification.getName() returned by Flowlet.configure().
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the flowlet
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to flow.
        instances - Number of instances for the flowlet
        Returns:
        An instance of FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreFlowlet for adding more flowlets.
